actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require institutions of higher education to create a venue-specific heat emergency action plan.
short_title: Jordan McNair Student-Athlete Heat Fatality Prevention Act

summary.text:
Jordan McNair Student-Athlete Heat Fatality Prevention Act

This bill requires each institution of higher education that participates in federal student-aid programs and is a member of an athletic association or athletic conference to develop and implement a venue-specific heat emergency action plan for operating and using automatic external defibrillators and cold-water immersion equipment.

titles.title: Jordan McNair Student-Athlete Heat Fatality Prevention Act
Jordan McNair Student-Athlete Heat Fatality Prevention Act
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require institutions of higher education to create a venue-specific heat emergency action plan.
